4bd8435b019364b6a9b487e5d75bd6c2bb195b07.query:
WITH stats AS (
                SELECT note_id, count(1)
                FROM note_repeats_history
                GROUP BY note_id
            )
            SELECT
                n.note_id AS note_id,
                COALESCE(s.count, 0) AS count
            FROM notes n
            LEFT JOIN stats s USING(note_id)
            WHERE NOT n.is_deleted;

6f50d611160d40b634f94021505209818e7fc9bb.query:
INSERT INTO
                note_repeats_history (repeat_id, note_id, user_id, repeated_at)
            VALUES ($1::uuid, $2::uuid, $3::bigint, $4::timestamp)

720a7e767ed53d390b3c6da4ef54307d2f2b9cb8.query:
SELECT
                -- this alias tells sqlx that material_id is nullable
                m.material_id AS "material_id?",
                m.title,
                m.authors,
                n.content,
                n.added_at,
                CASE
                    WHEN s IS NULL THEN 'queue'
                    WHEN s.completed_at IS NULL THEN 'reading'
                    ELSE 'completed'
                END AS "material_status!"
            FROM notes n
            LEFT JOIN materials m USING(material_id)
            LEFT JOIN statuses s USING(material_id)
            WHERE n.note_id = $1::uuid AND NOT n.is_deleted;

836b758f91e06b85dcff825546a728da6a237075.query: SELECT count(1) FROM notes WHERE not is_deleted;

9f151fbb30536884cd9aea24b5245ca82c3bd546.query:
SELECT repeated_at, COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY material_id)
            FROM repeats
            WHERE material_id = $1
            ORDER BY repeated_at DESC
            LIMIT 1;
